Increase in the Medicare payroll tax by: 9 percent on incomes over $200,000 ($250,000 for couples filing jointly) starting in 2013.
Implementation of a new 3: 8 percent tax on investment income for individuals earning over $200,000 ($250,000 for couples filing jointly) starting in 2013.
Introduction of a 40 percent excise tax: cost health plans ("Cadillac plans") over $10,200 for individuals and $27,500 for families starting in 2018.
Implementation of new annual fees on pha: expected to raise $27 billion over the next 10 years.
